attributes.action: Furlough all takeaways during the covid-19 pandemic.
attributes.additional_details: Most takeaways are not big enough to follow the social distancing rule, the demand for takeaways is too much for the individual stores to handle, they are not essential and staff are at risk.
attributes.background: Furlough all takeaways during the pandemic, or at least takeaways where the 2m distancing rule cannot be applied or where the staff are from different households.
